metadata.name: Never Breakfast!
metadata.description:
Tired of your gamebreaking synergies being ruined by breakfasting, or rerolling into an empty void of nothing but HP ups?
The answer to your problems is here! Upon picking up a breakfast duplicate, rerolling into multiple breakfasts or encountering the morning snack in any way, it will [h1][b]reroll the breakfast into a completely random item![/b][/h1]
[b]Never will you have to worry about Breakfasting again![/b]
